amendment.description: To reduce the amount rescinded from Global Health programs to preserve funding for programs addressing diseases.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2862 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 400.

action.text: Amendment SA 2862 proposed by Senator Schiff to Amendment SA 2853.
